sentences.cn: 在你打发我们走以前再请仔细考虑一下吧.

sentences.en: Could it possibly be that he might be that ere the day was done!
sentences.cn: 难道在天黑之前,他也可能变成这个样子吗?

sentences.en: For he was great, ere fortune made him so ( John Dryden )
sentences.cn: 他天生是个伟大的人物 ( 约翰德赖登 )

sentences.en: He will die , ere he will yield.
I shall be gone ere morning.
I shall start ere you return.
sentences.cn: 在你回来前我就会出发.

sentences.en: It quite poisoned for him the bark of the two bloodhounds that kept watch th ere.
sentences.cn: 他连在那里守望着的两只警犬的吠声都感到厌恶.

sentences.en: It was not long ere a call came from the house and recalled me from my reflections.
sentences.cn: 不久，家里打来了电话，把我从沉思中唤醒。

sentences.en: Let us part, ere the season of passion forget us.
sentences.cn: 分手吧, 趁情热季节未把我们忘却.

sentences.en: She often said she would die a thousand deaths ere you should know her shame.
sentences.cn: 她常说她宁可死一千次也不愿让你知道她的丑事.

sentences.en: Take the water ere the clock strikes twelve.
The day was well over ere the last Fitu - Ivan bank note had been redeemed with coin.
sentences.cn: 等把最后一张斐士一艾法纸币兑成硬币的时候,夜幕已经降临.

sentences.en: To fazarts , hard hazards are death ere they come there.
sentences.cn: 胆小鬼遇到危险便吓得要死.

sentences.en: To love that well which thou must leave ere long.
sentences.cn: 爱我吧,我在世的日子已不会太久.

sentences.en: Yet this we ask ere you leave us, that you speak to us and give us of your truth.
sentences.cn: 然而在你离开我们之前，对我们说话，把你的真理传述给我们。

sentences.en: Yet, if death be in this cup, I bid thee think again, ere thou beholdest me quaff it.
sentences.cn: 不过，要是这杯药可以致我于死地，在你眼看着我一口吞下去之前，我请求你再想一想。

sentences.en: You ere lost and gone forever, dreadful sorry, Clementine.
sentences.cn: 你永远地走了, 不再回来, 我真懊悔,克莱门泰.
